Articles.Content:
loaded up KSP to do some docking manuevers tonight(failed misserably a few times) and set a real time alarm for an hour, i set my target as the mun and started in that direction, about halfway their i go to check the time on my alarm and the alarm clock window is gone......and the button wont bring it back......

heres the log. https://www.dropbox.com/s/qkfc349luoxhz1x/output_log.txt?dl=0
Mini AVC says you're running two different versions of KAC at the same time.

Dunno. I guess it's related to your downgrade attempt as multiple of your mods are having two versions: one for 1.6 and one for 1.4. Maybe it's just the AVC cache (if it has one) but maybe you need to cleanly reinstall some or all of your mods.

4 hours ago, Harry Rhodan said:

Mini AVC says you're running two different versions of KAC at the same time.

There is just one .DLL listed in the log and the second avc entry just shows the online .version file since it is different to the local one. KAC got an update recently so avc will compare these files and decide if the update is compatible with the game version. In this case, it isn't (probably it is but the version file is set to 1.6+).

So far, I cannot find anything unusual regarding KAC...does the issue persists after restarting the game?
